mlFrameworks.name: TensorFlow
mlFrameworks.description: An end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources.

mlFrameworks.name: PyTorch
mlFrameworks.description: An open source machine learning framework based on the Torch library, used for applications such as computer vision and natural language processing.

mlFrameworks.name: scikit-learn
mlFrameworks.description: A free software machine learning library for Python. It features various classification, regression and clustering algorithms.

mlFrameworks.name: Keras
mlFrameworks.description: An open-source neural-network library written in Python. It is capable of running on top of TensorFlow, Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit, Theano, or PlaidML.

mlFrameworks.name: XGBoost
mlFrameworks.description: An optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.
